summary: Eden V1 Release - Public Client Status Portal and SMS Live Mode testing complete. All 21 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend public status portal verified with Care Claims branding, progress timeline, masked client info, and responsive mobile design.
critical_code_review_comments: Public status endpoint correctly requires NO authentication - accessible via unique claim ID in SMS/email links
Client name properly masked (e.g., 'Test C.' instead of full name) for privacy
Property address properly masked (city/state only) for privacy
Sensitive fields (client_email, client_phone, estimated_value, settlement_amount) NOT exposed in public endpoint
SMS status shows configured=true and dry_run_mode=false - Twilio is in LIVE mode
AI service has proper guardrails: legal promise patterns stripped, sensitive keywords flagged, human approval always required
Progress timeline shows all 5 stages (intake, inspection, negotiation, settlement, closed) with visual indicators
Error state properly handles invalid claim IDs with user-friendly message and contact info
context_for_next_testing_agent: Public Client Status Portal fully functional at /status/{claimId}. Public API at /api/client-status/claim/{claim_id}/public returns masked client info without auth. SMS is now in LIVE mode (dry_run_mode=false). Twilio credentials configured with sender +18448215610.

GET /api/client-status/claim/{claim_id}/.details: Returns claim status without authentication, masks client name and address for privacy

GET /api/client-status/stages.details: Returns all 5 claim stages with order, label, and description

Public Status Portal UI (Desktop).details: Care Claims branding, progress timeline, claim info, contact card all render correctly

Public Status Portal UI (Mobile).details: Responsive design with vertical timeline, all elements accessible

Error State (Invalid Claim).details: Shows 'Claim Not Found' with contact info for support

Privacy Protection.details: Client name masked (first name + last initial), address masked (city/state only), no sensitive fields exposed

sms_system_config.note: Twilio SMS is now LIVE - messages will be sent to real phone numbers

ai_service_guardrails.sensitive_keywords: Flags 'lawsuit', 'attorney', 'fraud', 'bad faith', etc. for human review
ai_service_guardrails.audit_logging: All AI interactions logged to ai_audit collection
